# PortfolioMode enumeration

The enabled portfolio mode during testing.

```csharp
public enum PortfolioMode
```

## Values

| name | value | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| None | `0` | Portfolio mode is disabled. |
| Fair | `1` | Fair portfolio mode is enabled. |
| Unfair | `2` | Unfair portfolio mode is enabled. |
